name: Chennai Trade Centre
short_description: Chennai Trade Centre is the hub of commercial and cultural activity in the grand city of Chennai, Having been commissioned in 2001, the trade centre comprises of a sprawling convention centre and an equally massive convention centre. With all the interlinked halls, spacious and technologically fully loaded convention centres, and swanky exhibition centres, Chennai Trade Centre is where all the commercial and cultural activity in Chennai and neighbouring towns is concentrated. Combined together the convention centre and the exhibition halls can accommodate more than 2000 participants and attendees, which makes CTC the premiere destination for events such as international brand exhibitions.
